E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Jeff Branson
Dear Sir,
Jeff Branson is hitting the ball well at A Winston-Salem Spirits!
He has an AVG of .299, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Brian D. Johnson
Dear Sir,
Brian D. Johnson has an AVG of .390 at A Winston-Salem Spirits!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 5/3/1990
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Terry Pendleton

Date: Monday, 5/5/1990
Subject: Progress of Eddie Perez
Dear Sir,
Eddie Perez has nothing more to prove at A Winston-Salem Spirits!
He has an AVG of .279 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 5/10/1990
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Ozzie Virgil Jr.



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1990
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Roger Clemens
